Ingredients.1: 1 tablespoon vegetable oil, or more as needed

Ingredients.3: 1  bell pepper, cut into strips, or more to taste

Ingredients.4: 2  skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, cut into strips

Ingredients.5: 0.25 cup water, or more to taste

Ingredients.6: 2 tablespoons taco seasoning mix, or more to taste

Directions.1: Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a skillet over medium heat; stir in onion and bell pepper. Cook and stir until the onion has softened and turned translucent, about 5 minutes. Remove vegetables to a plate.

Directions.2: Add chicken to the skillet, adding more oil if needed. Saute until chicken is no longer pink and the juices run clear, about 5 minutes. Add water and taco seasoning; stir until seasoning dissolves. Simmer until sauce begins to thicken and stick to chicken, and chicken is fully cooked, 3 to 5 minutes.

Directions.3: Serve chicken and vegetables on tortillas.
